title: Weed
creator_credit: Concept Films, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Brian Kellman
brief_description: Traces the use of marijuana throughout history. Compares past and present attitudes towards it use. Discusses known physiological and psychological effects, plans for future research into still unanswered questions about these effects, and the social and legal implications of possession.
